languages.text: Паломник деликатно намекает, что его тайны и в обычных руках стоят немало, а в руках Вольного Торговца — целое состояние, если вы сумеете достойно ими воспользоваться.

traits.locale_text: Паломник деликатно намекает, что его тайны и в обычных руках стоят немало, а в руках Вольного Торговца — целое состояние, если вы сумеете достойно ими воспользоваться.

languages.text: The Pilgrim hints discreetly that his secrets would be valuable enough for anyone, and in the hands of a Rogue Trader, they hold the promise of an entire fortune — if you can make the most of them.
languages.original_text: Паломник деликатно намекает, что его тайны и в обычных руках стоят немало, а в руках Вольного Торговца — целое состояние, если вы сумеете достойно ими воспользоваться.

traits.locale_text: The Pilgrim hints discreetly that his secrets would be valuable enough for anyone, and in the hands of a Rogue Trader, they hold the promise of an entire fortune if you can make worthy use of them.
The Pilgrim hints discreetly that his secrets would be valuable enough for anyone, and in the hands of a Rogue Trader, they hold the promise of an entire fortune if you can make worthy use of them.

The Pilgrim hints discreetly that his secrets would be valuable enough for anyone, and in the hands of a Rogue Trader, they hold the promise of an entire fortune if you can make appropriate use of them.
The Pilgrim hints discreetly that his secrets would be valuable enough for anyone, and in the hands of a Rogue Trader, they hold the promise of an entire fortune — if you can make the most of them.
The Pilgrim hints discreetly that his secrets would be valuable enough for anyone, and in the hands of a Rogue Trader, they hold the promise of an entire fortune — if you can make the most of them.
The Pilgrim hints discreetly that his secrets would be valuable enough for anyone, and in the hands of a Rogue Trader, they hold the promise of an entire fortune — if you can make the most of them.

languages.text: 朝圣者谨慎地暗示道，他知道的这些秘密对任何人而言都相当有价值。如果行商浪人知道了这些秘密，又懂得如何利用这些情报，那这些秘密绝对可以带来大笔财富。
languages.original_text: The Pilgrim hints discreetly that his secrets would be valuable enough for anyone, and in the hands of a Rogue Trader, they hold the promise of an entire fortune — if you can make the most of them.

traits.locale_text: 朝圣者谨慎地暗示道，他知道的这些秘密对任何人而言都相当有价值。如果行商浪人知道了这些秘密，又懂得如何利用这些情报，那这些秘密绝对可以带来大笔财富。

languages.text: El Peregrino indica discretamente que sus secretos serían de gran valor para cualquiera y en manos de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente prometen una fortuna entera si sabes aprovecharlos.
languages.original_text: The Pilgrim hints discreetly that his secrets would be valuable enough for anyone, and in the hands of a Rogue Trader, they hold the promise of an entire fortune — if you can make the most of them.

traits.locale_text: El Peregrino indica discretamente que sus secretos serían de gran valor para cualquiera y en manos de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente prometen una fortuna entera si sabes aprovecharlos.

languages.text: 巡礼者は、彼の秘密は誰しもにとって価値があるのだと控えめに示唆する。ローグトレーダーの手には、莫大な財産が約束されている。しかし、それは秘密を最大限に活用することができればだ。
languages.original_text: The Pilgrim hints discreetly that his secrets would be valuable enough for anyone, and in the hands of a Rogue Trader, they hold the promise of an entire fortune — if you can make the most of them.

traits.locale_text: 巡礼者は、彼の秘密は誰しもにとって価値があるのだと控えめに示唆する。ローグトレーダーの手には、莫大な財産が約束されている。しかし、それは秘密を最大限に活用することができればだ。

languages.text: Der Pilger deutet diskret an, dass seine Geheimnisse für jeden wertvoll wären, in den Händen {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} aber sogar ein gewaltiges Vermögen versprechen — wenn du sie geschickt zu nutzen weißt.
languages.original_text: The Pilgrim hints discreetly that his secrets would be valuable enough for anyone, and in the hands of a Rogue Trader, they hold the promise of an entire fortune — if you can make the most of them.

traits.locale_text: Der Pilger deutet diskret an, dass seine Geheimnisse für jeden wertvoll wären, in den Händen {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} aber sogar ein gewaltiges Vermögen versprechen — wenn du sie geschickt zu nutzen weißt.

languages.text: Le Pèlerin suggère subtilement que ses secrets pourraient profiter à tout un chacun, mais qu'entre les mains d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, ils pourraient mener à une grande fortune, à condition d'en faire bon usage.
languages.original_text: The Pilgrim hints discreetly that his secrets would be valuable enough for anyone, and in the hands of a Rogue Trader, they hold the promise of an entire fortune — if you can make the most of them.

traits.locale_text: Le Pèlerin suggère subtilement que ses secrets pourraient profiter à tout un chacun, mais qu'entre les mains d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, ils pourraient mener à une grande fortune, à condition d'en faire bon usage.

languages.text: Hacı, sırlarının herkes için yeterince değerli olabileceğini ve onları iyi kullanman durumunda bir Hür Tacir'in elinde muazzam bir servet değerinde olabileceklerini ima ediyor.
languages.original_text: The Pilgrim hints discreetly that his secrets would be valuable enough for anyone, and in the hands of a Rogue Trader, they hold the promise of an entire fortune — if you can make the most of them.
